metadata.description: {\rtf1\ansi\fs24{\fs48\b Geraint's JSFX repository\b}\line\line This is a collection of audio effects I have written in REAPER's JSFX language.\line\line {\par \bullet\tab Bad Connection - flips between two volumes to simulate poor connection or dropouts\line \bullet\tab Dual Distortion - simple distortion with asymmetric parameters\line \bullet\tab Spectrum Matcher - analyse the difference between an input and a model, and optionally correct with EQ\line }\lineThere are also some presets (RPL) available for Bad Connection <Bad Connection.rpl> and Spectrum Matcher <Spectrum Matcher.rpl>.\line\line These effects are available on ReaPack <https://reapack.com/> - add the repository: https://geraintluff.github.io/jsfx/index.xml\line\line }
